tags.name: lrndesign-blockquote
tags.description:
`lrndesign-blockquote`
`A structured blockquote element`

Attributes:

  * `citation` {`string`} - Source being cited

  * `image` {`string`} - Optional image to use

  * `author` {`string`} - Optional author of the quote

  * `source-link` {`string`} - Optional source that links to where the quote is from

  * `display-mode` {`string`} - Funny 1900s vision.

Properties:

  * `citation` {`string`} - Source being cited

  * `image` {`string`} - Optional image to use

  * `author` {`string`} - Optional author of the quote

  * `sourceLink` {`string`} - Optional source that links to where the quote is from

  * `displayMode` {`string`} - Funny 1900s vision.

attributes.name: image
attributes.description:
`image` {`string`} - Optional image to use

Property: image

attributes.name: author
attributes.description:
`author` {`string`} - Optional author of the quote

Property: author

attributes.name: source-link
attributes.description:
`source-link` {`string`} - Optional source that links to where the quote is from

Property: sourceLink

attributes.name: display-mode
attributes.description:
`display-mode` {`string`} - Funny 1900s vision.

Property: displayMode

Default: default
